name: Workflowy Date tags (for use with Complice)
description: Make tagged dates pretty. This is designed for use with the unofficial Complice integration, which will automatically pull in the tasks you have tagged for a given day. Don't just make plans, make them happen!

user.name: Malcolm Ocean
user.about:
I blog about culture, change, and metacognition at malcolmocean.com.

I help people achieve their goals with complice.co.

additional_info:
